formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For taxable income I and bracket i with lower bound L_i, upper bound U_i, and rate r_i: $$T(I) = \sum_{i=1}^{n} \max\left(0, \min(I, U_i) - L_i\right) \cdot r_i$$ With two nonzero brackets in South Carolina (after a 0% band) and nonrefundable credits C: $$T_{net}(I) = \max\left(0,\; T(I) - C \right)$$ Marginal rate: $$r_{marginal} = r_j \ \text{such that}\ L_j < I \le U_j$$ Effective rate: $$r_{effective} = \begin{cases} \dfrac{T_{net}(I)}{I}, & I>0 \\[6pt] 0, & I=0 \end{cases}$$
